ComicInfo.Summary: Cavewoman: Oasis is a new 2 issue mini-series by Devon Massey featuring his beautifully done ink-washed artwork. Beautiful girls are missing in Marshville and it's up to Meriem to find out why. Tracking her quarry across the burning sands of the Pangaean desert, Meriem discovers an oasis and a secret desert city ruled by a sinister Master, intent on adding Meriem to his collection of beautiful captives. Meriem infiltrates the harem but is soon discovered and now must survive as a gladiator in the Master's arena, the Bowl of Bones, where she battles the greatest warriors in the Pangaean desert and the deadliest dinosaurs of the burning sands.
ComicInfo.Title: Mystery Moon
